DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study assess safety , tolerability pharmacokinetics capsule AZD6244 patient advance solid malignancy .
DOC.brief_title: AZD6244 ( ARRY-142886 ) Solid Oral Dosage Formulation Patients With Advanced Solid Malignancies
DOC.criteria: cancer refractory standard therapy WHO performance status 02 evidence postmenopausal status negative pregnancy test Radiotherapy/chemotherapy within 21 day prior entry brain metastases/spinal cord compression unless stable steroids/anticonvulsants evidence severe/uncontrolled systemic disease participate investigational drug study within 30 day
